title: jayamangaLam nithya shubhamangalam
language:
Pallavi

jaya mangaLam nitya subha mangaLam 
(jaya)

Anu
sahitya:
mangaLam rukmiNI ramaNAya shrImatE mangaLam ramaNIya mUrtayE
tE
mangaLam shrIvatsa bhUSaya sharginE mangaLam nanda gOpAtmajAya 
(jaya)

CaraNam

navanIta cOraya nandadi gOpa gOrakshiNE gOpikA vallabhAya
nArada munIndranuta nAmadEyAya tE nArAyaNanAnanda tIrtha guravE 
(jaya)
